name: opencode-swarm-plugin
description: Multi-agent swarm coordination for OpenCode with learning capabilities, beads integration, and Agent Mail

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --external @electric-sql/pglite && bun build ./src/plugin.ts --outfile ./dist/plugin.js --target node --external @electric-sql/pglite
scripts.test: bun test src/schemas src/skills.test.ts src/streams/index.test.ts src/streams/events.test.ts src/streams/projections.test.ts src/streams/migrations.test.ts src/streams/debug.test.ts src/streams/agent-mail.test.ts src/streams/effect/deferred.test.ts src/streams/effect/mailbox.test.ts
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:swarm
scripts.release: npm run build && npm version patch && git push && npm run publish:otp
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push && npm run publish:otp
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && git push && npm run publish:otp

author: Joel Hooks
